requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
